name: ext_R4_CoverageEligibilityRequest_insurance
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.CoverageEligibilityRequest.insurance for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents CoverageEligibilityRequest.insurance from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CoverageEligibilityRequest|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R3.

element.definition: Financial instruments for reimbursement for the health care products and services.
element.comment: `CoverageEligibilityRequest.insurance` has no related element in R3:EligibilityRequest

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
